incidents.name: Issue with KYC Onboarding in TrustHub Console

incident_updates.body: Degraded performance on our TrustHub portal in Console has been resolved and the Account Upgrade flow is operating normally at this time.

Account Upgrade flow in TrustHub portal in Console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently seeing degraded performance on our TrustHub portal in Console. Customers are unable to create Compliance Profiles, Branded Calling registrations, or Regulatory Compliance Bundles, and will see an error in Console. Customers going through the Account Upgrade flow will also see an error. Additionally our ISV customers using Embeds will also see errors. Our engineering team is looking into the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
